graphicalExtremes 0.1.0.9000

Reference

All functions

Gamma2Sigma()

Transformation of \(\Gamma\) matrix to \(\Sigma^{(k)}\) matrix

Gamma2chi()

Transformation of the Huesler--Reiss variogram \(\Gamma\) to extremal correlation \(\chi\)

Gamma2chi_3D()

Compute theoretical \(\chi\) in 3D

Gamma2graph()

Transformation of \(\Gamma\) matrix to graph object

Gamma2par()

Extract upper triangular part of \(\Gamma\)

Sigma2Gamma()

Transformation of \(\Sigma^{(k)}\) matrix to \(\Gamma\) matrix

V_HR()

Compute exponent measure

censor()

Censor dataset

chi2Gamma()

Transformation of extremal correlation \(\chi\) to the Huesler--Reiss variogram \(\Gamma\)

complete_Gamma()

Completion of Gamma matrix on block graphs

data2mpareto()

Data standardization to multivariate Pareto scale

dim_Gamma()

Is Gamma square matrix?

emp_chi()

Empirical estimation of extremal correlation \(\chi\)

emp_chi_mat()

Empirical estimation of extremal correlation matrix \(\chi\)

emp_vario()

Estimation of the variogram matrix \(\Gamma\) of the Huesler--Reiss distribution

fmpareto_HR()

Parameter fitting for multivariate Huesler--Reiss Pareto distribution

fmpareto_graph_HR()

Parameter fitting for multivariate Huesler--Reiss Pareto distributions on block graphs

graphicalExtremes

graphicalExtremes: Statistical methodology for graphical extreme value models.

logLH_HR()

Full censored log-likelihood of HR model

logdVK_HR()

Compute censored exponent measure

logdV_HR()

Compute the exponent measure density of HR distribution

mparetomargins()

Marginalize multivariate Pareto dataset

mst_HR()

Fitting of Huesler--Reiss minimum spanning tree

par2Gamma()

Create \(\Gamma\) from vector

rmpareto()

Sampling of a multivariate Pareto distribution

rmpareto_tree()

Sampling of a multivariate Pareto distribution on a tree

rmstable()

Sampling of a multivariate max-stable distribution

rmstable_tree()

Sampling of a multivariate max-stable distribution on a tree

select_edges()

Select edges to add to a graph

set_graph_parameters()

Set graphical parameters

simu_px_HR()

Simulate HR extremal functions

simu_px_dirichlet()

Simulate Dirichlet extremal functions

simu_px_logistic()

Simulate logistic extremal functions

simu_px_neglogistic()

Simulate negative logistic extremal functions

simu_px_tree_HR()

Simulate HR extremal functions on a tree

simu_px_tree_dirichlet()

Simulate Dirichlet extremal functions on a tree

simu_px_tree_logistic()

Simulate logistic extremal functions on a tree

unif()

Uniform margin
